mean_cn: adj. 怀疑的；可疑的；无把握的
mean_en: (of a person) not certain and slightly suspicious about something; not knowing whether something is good or bad
sentence: The girl was dubious about what the talent agent was saying.
sentence_trans: 这个女孩对星探说的话表示怀疑。
word_etyma: dub二，双 + ious有……性质的 → 二种状态 → 不肯定，怀疑的 → dubious半信半疑的
